name: Integration Apify, HTTP, Tools, Google Gemini AI

contentType.label: application/jsonEnter data in the JSON format, as a string or using a data structure.

inputMethod.label: JSON stringEnter the JSON body as a raw text string. If values contain JSON reserved characters, you must escape them manually.

authenticationType.label: No authenticationUse when no credentials are required for the request.

parts.text:
You are an expert B2B sales analyst. Evaluate the following business lead:

Business: {{3.title}}
Website: {{3.website}}
Rating: {{3.totalScore}}/5 ({{3.reviewsCount}} reviews)
Location: {{3.address}}
Employees: {{7.EmployeeCount}} 
Industry: {{7.Industry}} 
Contact: {{7.ContactName}} 
Email: {{7.ContactEmail}}

Analyze the lead and return ONLY valid JSON in the structure below.  
Follow the scoring rules precisely.

SCORING RULES (0–100):
- +20 if Employees > 10
- +20 if Rating >= 4.0
- +10 if Industry is clear (not Unknown)
- +10 if Contact Title is senior (Owner, CEO, Founder, Director)
- +20 if Contact Email is valid and not empty

QUALITY LABEL:
- Hot = score >= 70
- Warm = 40–69
- Cold = 0–39

INSIGHTS GUIDELINES:
Provide 2-3 insights about:
- Lead’s size, credibility, or reputation
- Buying likelihood based on contact role
- Industry maturity
- Website/professionalism indicators

PAIN POINT RULES:
List 2-3 likely business challenges related to:
- Growth
- Marketing
- Operations
- Competition
- Customer retention

STRATEGY GUIDELINES:
Give a clear, personalized outreach approach based on the lead’s size, role, and industry.

Return JSON ONLY in this format:

{
  "score": number,
  "quality": "Hot" | "Warm" | "Cold",
  "insights": ["...", "..."],
  "strategy": "...",
  "pain_points": ["...", "..."]
}

contents.text:
Hi Team,

Your lead enrichment is complete!
📊 Batch Summary:
• Total Leads Processed: {{length(12.array)}}
• Enriched with: Company data, contact emails, AI insights

🔗 View in Airtable:
[ https://airtable.com/apphzB4bqKOmp8suv/tblmVbh5kmr6fzdhk/viwvj8olPvMloI53S]

Leads are categorized by quality (Hot/Warm/Cold) and include:
✓ Decision-maker contact info
✓ Company intelligence
✓ Personalized outreach strategies
✓ Identified pain points

Ready to start outreach!
